Player History
Drafted in 12th round, 133rd overall pick, by Washington in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Serafin Planas (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2019, off Alfredo Padilla (MIN)...
Drove in 7 runs against New York on 4/13/2019...
Injured on 6/2/2019 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 4/1/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $904,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 3/2/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $550,000 per year...
Released by Baltimore on 3/2/2021...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 4/6/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
